ps1.7:7.1: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, ahosi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:7.2: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, nāhosi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:7.3: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, atthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:7.4: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, natthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:7.5: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:7.6: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:8.1: Atthi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, atthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:8.2: Atthi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, natthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:8.3: Atthi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:8.4: Atthi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:9.1: Bhavissati kusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:9.2: Bhavissati kusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.1: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, ahosi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.2: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, nāhosi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.3: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.4: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, natthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.5: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.6: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:11.1: Atthi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:11.2: Atthi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, natthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:11.3: Atthi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:11.4: Atthi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:12.1: Bhavissati akusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:12.2: Bhavissati akusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:13.15: ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, ahosi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:13.16: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, nāhosi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:13.17: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, atthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:13.18: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, natthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:13.19: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:13.20: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:14.1: Atthi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, atthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:14.2: Atthi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, natthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:14.3: Atthi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:14.4: Atthi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:15.1: Bhavissati dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:15.2: Bhavissati dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipākoti.
